participants.name: Mark Shook
participants.title: Owner, ButcherBlockCo.com - Online Seller of Butcher Block Countertops, Furniture & Accessories. CEO & Board Director.

messages.message: Happy to, Brian. I found your background interesting.
Same same. My brother is an aspiring chef so that drew me to your title and product. I love it!
What would you buy if you suddenly obtained a billion dollars?
